text: "You and Me" is a 1977 song by Alice Cooper. It is from his studio album Lace and Whiskey. It was ranked number 2 in Australia, number 3 in Canada, number 9 in the United States, number 21 in New Zealand, and number 45 in France. ==References== Category:1977 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Alice Cooper songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: You and Me (Alice Cooper song)
